mapper.select: SELECT t.`EXPERT_ID` AS expertId, t.`USER_ID` AS userId, t.`CONTENT`, t.`PRICE`, t.`SCORE` FROM basis_tb_expert t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.`TYPE` = #{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_expert ( USER_ID, CONTENT, PRICE, SCORE, TYPE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{content}, #{price}, 0, #{type}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
